IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDING FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR CHARITIES, CHILDREN AND FAMILIES IN NEED.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDING FINANCIAL SUPPORT TO CHARITIES AND OTHERS IN NEED, FOCUSING ON CHILDREN AND FAMILIES IN COMMUNITIES WHERE ESCO TECHNOLOGIES INC. HAS OPERATIONS. THE FOUNDATION'S GOAL IS TO MAKE A MEASURABLE DIFFERENCE TO EACH CHARITY AND RESPECTIVE COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: FINANCIAL SUPPORT TO CHARITIES AND OTHERS IN NEED: THE FOUNDATION PROVIDED FINANCIAL SUPPORT TO 32 501(C)(3) TAX EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS DURING 2017 WHOSE MISSIONS AND PROGRAMS FOCUS ON CHILDREN AND FAMILIES. THE FOUNDATION ALSO PROVIDED ASSISTANCE FOR 5 HARDSHIP CASES DURING 2017.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ANNUAL COLLEGE SCHOLARSHIP PROGRAM: THE FOUNDATION ANNUALLY AWARDS COLLEGE SCHOLARSHIPS TO CHILDREN OF ESCO TECHNOLOGIES INC. DURING 2017, THE FOUNDATION AWARDED 15 SCHOLARSHIPS TOTALING $45,000. (15 - $3,000 SCHOLARSHIPS)

IRS990ScheduleA.FactsAndCircumstancesTestTxt: THE ESCO FOUNDATION CLEARLY MEETS THE ESTABLISHED PUBLIC SUPPORT REQUIREMENTS FOR A PUBLIC CHARITY. THE FOUNDATION WAS FORMED IN 2005. SINCE THEN, IT HAS ACHIEVED A PUBLIC SUPPORT TO TOTAL SUPPORT RATIO OF 26.65% DURING THE CURRENT FIVE YEAR PERIOD. THIS RATIO IS WELL ABOVE THE 10% MINIMUM THRESHOLD ESTABLISHED BY THE IRS. IN 2013, THE RATIO EXCEEDED THE 33 1/3% SUPPORT TEST.THE FOUNDATION MEETS ALL OF THE REQUIREMENTS OF THE FACTS AND CIRCUMSTANCES TEST. THE FOUNDATION HAS IMPLEMENTED A PROGRAM TO ATTRACT PUBLIC SUPPORT. THIS PROGRAM INCLUDES MAINTAINING A WEBSITE, DISTRIBUTING PAMPHLETS, DISPLAYING POSTERS AND DIRECT MAIL ACTIVITIES. THIS PROGRAM HAS LED TO CASH CONTRIBUTIONS FROM A WIDE SPECTRUM OF SOURCES INCLUDING 258 ESCO TECHNOLOGIES INC. EMPLOYEES AND 3 THIRD-PARTY DONORS.FURTHER, THE FOUNDATION IS GOVERNED BY A BOARD OF DIRECTORS COMPOSED OF PERSONNEL FROM SIX STATES STRETCHING FROM MASSACHUSETTS TO SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA. DIRECTORS HAVE BEEN SELECTED FROM DIVERSE PROFESSIONAL DISCIPLINES AND A VARIETY OF OPERATING SUBSIDIARIES. MANY OF THESE DIRECTORS DONATE TIME TO THE CHARITIES SUPPORTED BY THE FOUNDATION SUCH AS THROUGH OUR ANNUAL HABITAT FOR HUMANITY BUILD DAY. AS A RESULT, THE BOARD STAYS IN TOUCH WITH THE INTERESTS OF THE PUBLIC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ESCO TECHNOLOGIES FOUNDATION HAS A DOCUMENT "GUIDELINES FOR EVALUATING REQUESTS FOR SUPPORT". THE GUIDELINES REQUIRE NOMINATED ORGANIZATIONS FIT THE FOUNDATION'S MISSION AND GOAL AND ARE INTENDED TO ASSIST DIRECTORS WITH EVALUATING WHETHER A REQUEST FOR SUPPORT SHOULD BE BROUGHT TO THE BOARD FOR CONSIDERATION. THE FOUNDATION ONLY CONSIDERS SUPPORT REQUESTS WHICH FOLLOW THE GUIDELINES. CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION FUNDS ARE DISPERSED DIRECTLY TO 501 (C)(3) ORGANIZATIONS. HARDSHIP/DISASTER ASSISTANCE FUNDS ARE REMITTED DIRECTLY TO THE PROVIDER OF GOODS/SERVICES ON BEHALF OF THE BENEFICIARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE COMMITTEES THAT ARE AUTHORIZED TO ACT ON ITS BEHALF.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE SECRETARY OF THE BOARD. CHANGES, IF ANY, ARE DISCUSSED WITH THE EXTERNAL CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM AND INCORPORATED INTO THE RETURN PRIOR TO FILING WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH DIRECTOR MUST DISCLOSE ANY FINANCIAL INTEREST THAT HE/SHE MAY HAVE IN ANY ENTITY THAT REQUESTS SUPPORT FROM THE FOUNDATION OR IS OTHERWISE ENGAGED IN TRANSACTIONS WITH THE FOUNDATION IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE POLICY. THE BOARD MAY DETERMINE THAT A FINANCIAL INTEREST CONSTITUTES A CONFLICT OF INTEREST. IN THAT CASE, THE BOARD MAY ASK THAT PARTICULAR DIRECTOR TO LEAVE DURING THE DISCUSSION OF THE REQUEST FOR SUPPORT AS WELL AS ABSTAIN FROM VOTING ON THAT SPECIFIC EVENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST. FINANCIAL INFORMATION IS ALSO AVAILABLE ON THE FOUNDATION'S WEBSITE.
